sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card style="height: 200px;" color="#BF6211">
    <v-card-title class="text-h4 font-weight-black text-white mt-6 ml-4">商品推薦</v-card-title>
    <v-card-subtitle class="text-h6 font-weight-black text-white mt-4 ml-4">
      希望有你喜欢的商品
    </v-card-subtitle>
    <v-card-text>

    </v-card-text>
  </v-card>

  <v-container>
    <v-row>
      <v-col>
        <v-card
            class="mx-auto"
            max-width="344"
            height="350px"
        >
          <v-img
              src="https://cdn.vuetifyjs.com/images/cards/sunshine.jpg"
              height="200px"
              cover
          ></v-img>

          <v-card-title>
            Top western road trips
          </v-card-title>

          <v-card-subtitle>
            1,000 miles of wonder
          </v-card-subtitle>

          <v-btn
              color="#f28f16"
              class="font-weight-black text-white mt-2 ml-4"
              plain
              @click="toDetail"
          >
            <v-icon>mdi-briefcase-search</v-icon>
            查看详情
          </v-btn>

        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>



</template>

<script>
import {getRandomGood} from "../../../network/good";
import {onMounted, reactive} from "vue";

export default {
  name: "ProductsFeatured",
  setup() {

    const form = reactive({
      id: "",
      name: "",
      item: "",
      price: "",
    })

    const getGood = () => {
      getRandomGood(6).then(res=>{
        form.id = res.data.id
        form.name = res.data.name
        form.item = res.data.item
        form.price = res.data.price
      })
    }

    onMounted(()=>{
      getGood()
    })


    return {

    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
